A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was great as a lifelong Star Wars fan.  I have no idea why anyone else would feel so vitriolic about this movie.  It was hopeful and beautiful\, the change of pace was a breath of fresh air after \"The Force Awakens\" (which I also loved) where it seemed like the old formula was just being recycled.  It just goes to show you can't please everyone\, but this was my favorite Star Wars movie by far.
